name: 5 Minutes (Stephen Limcangco)
description:
Your best friend has been taken! As a toy, you must find household appliances to distract the human who kidnapped her, and keep him distracted before 5 minutes pass and your friend is thrown into the trash. 

Developed by: Daniel Bui, Jinhoon Choi, Andy Lang, Stephen Limcangco and Mohamad Win (Music by: Jasper Curry and Turner Lynch)
